name: Sadboi and the Swank
description:
It happened again! Swank broke free and the robots aren’t happy about it. Keep him safe as he dances about without a care for his own mortality.

Objective

Get points when Swank (pink) kicks the heck out of robots smaller than him. But be careful, if Swank kicks something too big, it’s game over. When you have enough points, Swank will be able to kick bigger bots. When exactly? Who knows! Take the leap of faith.

You play as Sadboi (green). Keep Swank safe by slapping robots out of the way. Feeling confident? Try punching small robots towards Swank to level up faster.

Controls

WASD/Arrow keys: Movement

Left Mouse Button: Punch

Check him out, he's dancin'. He's DANCIN'!
